title: Epstein Cultivated Ties to U.S. Customs Officers, Triggering Criminal Probe
novelty: Jeffrey Epstein cultivated relationships with U.S. Customs officers in the Virgin Islands through gifts and favors, prompting a criminal investigation into potential corruption or obstruction.
topic: Jeffrey Epstein cultivated relationships with U.S. Customs officers in the Virgin Islands through gifts and favors, prompting a criminal investigation into potential corruption or obstruction.

title: Haverford College Faces Calls to Strip Lutnick Library Name Over Epstein Ties
summary: Haverford College Faces Calls to Strip Lutnick Library Name Over Epstein Ties
novelty: Haverford College students and alumni are calling for the removal of Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's name from the college library following newly released Justice Department documents showing Lutnick had lunch with Epstein on his Caribbean island in 2012, contradicting his claim of cutting ties in 2005.
topic: Haverford College students and alumni are calling for the removal of Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick's name from the college library following newly released Justice Department documents showing Lutnick had lunch with Epstein on his Caribbean island in 2012, contradicting his claim of cutting ties in 2005.
